channel.title: Josh Safdie on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Timothee Chalamet Goes Electric: Actor Cruises to Brand Deal for Luxury Car Company
item.description: The Oscar nominated actor has signed on for a multi-year partnership to serve as a global ambassador for Lucid, the Silicon Valley-based technology company behind a line of advanced electric vehicles.
